title: Create a JSON Web Token.
name: Authenticate
description: Create a JSON Web Token based on the sent user. This token is needed to access most of the API. The token should be set in the Authorization header to access the rest of the API.

Parameter.description: User.
Password.
Id of the user. Either userId or username has to be set.
Name of the user. Will be used if userId is not set.

Success 200.description: JSON Web Token. To be used in the Authorization header.

title: Send a message
name: SendMessage
description: Send a message. Available messages types are: BROADCAST This message will be transmitted to all users and ignores roomId. WHISPER A private message sent to another user. participantIds has to contain the Id of the receiver and sender user. CHAT Normal chat message sent to a room.

Message.
Type of message. Default is CHAT.

[Unique, mutable] Human-readable name for the room.
Password that is required to enter the room.
Ids of the users who are part of the room. This is used for whisper rooms.
Is the name of the room locked from being changed?
Is the room anonymous? Setting a room to anonymous will most commonly hide the sender in the messages sent to the room for other users. Sender data will still be stored in the system.
Is it a whisper room? A whisper room is a private chat room between two to * participants.
Is it a system room? A system room is created on first run of the system. Removing or modifying them might break features in the system.
